user_query: I want to suggest cryptocurrency staking projects for my friend and provide associated activities.

TaskList.description: Research popular staking cryptocurrencies and their associated projects.
Gather information about staking rewards, lock-up periods, and other relevant incentives for each project found in step 1.
Compile the activities associated with each staking project, such as governance participation, rewards distribution process, and community engagement.
Present a summary of the staking projects, including key details and activities for each.
